name: Doherty HRO
tag_list: hr, hro, peo, aso, training, management, consulting, administrative-services, risk-management, benefits-administration, payroll-processing
overview:
A Midwest focused HR company. Minneapolis-based Doherty Staffing Solutions was Founded by Tim and Valerie Doherty in 1980 (then named Quality Temp). Employer Services was formed in 1993 when they recognized a trend towards outsourcing HR resources.

We provide highly personalized, proactive human resources outsourcing (HRO) and comprehensive human resources services â€“ all from a nationally ESAC accredited, SAS 70 Type II certified company. By taking care of the business of HR, Doherty enables you to focus on building your business and profitability.

With Professional Employer Organization (PEO), Administrative Services Outsourcing (ASO) and tailored HR Navigator models, Doherty offers ease, expertise and flexibility for all of your organizationâ€™s HR needs including payroll processing, benefits administration, human resources management, employment compliance, training, workersâ€™ compensation, risk management, consulting and Human Resource Information System (HRIS).

Doherty serves public and private organizations of all sizes nationwide. Doherty concentrates in the Midwest including Minnesota, Wisconsin, Iowa, Illinois and North and South Dakota.
